posts.post_title: T206 Eddie Collins Piedmont 350 PSA 3 $230 Shipped in CONUS
posts.post_content: Hey guys, first time seller on here but I sell on ebay as Interestingcoolstuff. This was an impulse purchase and have since decided it doesn't really fit in with my collection. $230 Paypal f/f gets it shipped out to you. Thanks!
